textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Leg opening: 14in / 35.5cm Inseam: 34in / 84cm Rise: 8.5in / 21.5cm MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Wash cold. 98% cotton/2% polyurethane. Fabric: Stretch denim. Hazy fading lightens the thighs of these 5-pocket straight-leg jeans, while wrinkled whiskering lends a gently worn look. Logo embroidery details the back pockets. Single-button closure and zip fly. Description Clothing > Citizens of Humanity > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Citizens of Humanity founder Jerome Dahan sees denim as an enduring symbol of the American landscape, and his premium line reflects this ideal. Fueled by creativity and a love of denim, this native Parisian began designing jeans in Montreal and later L.A., co-founding 7 For All Mankind and putting his stamp on other designer brands before founding Citizens in 2003. Unique and handcrafted to perfection, Citizens' cutting-edge styling, supreme comfort, and perfect fit have charmed the fashion world. See all Citizens of Humanity reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
